Introduction
This topic contains information on evaluating evidence of self-employment or employment with a tightly held corporation, including
deciding whether self-employed individuals are unemployable due to an SC disability
definition of a tightly held corporation
, and
evaluating evidence showing income from a tightly held corporation
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section C - Individual Unemployability (IU) Rating and Decision Review
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section C
